discourse_list.title: Wednesday and Thursday Endgame DVC Meetings: Presenting Endgame v3

content.content: As always, putting up the links here on the forum so people can join. This Wednesday and Thursday 9pm-10:30pm CEST I will continue to present the Endgame Plan v3, which is the latest iteration with major tokenomics simplifications, new terminology and new details around aspects such as how to respond to government crackdowns in the Endgame with Phoenix Stance. We are finally approaching the point where the plan can be presented in a simple enough format that a vote will soon be possible, and this will also be discussed at the call. There are now at least 3 active MetaDAO clusters, one for each Proof of Concept MetaDAO, so it will be important to get community agreement so that setting up forums and moving forward can be done - the practicalities of this will be a major focus this week. Links to the two calls: Wednesday 9pm CEST:   Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Thursday 9pm CEST:   Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Also here are some teaser diagrams Cheat Sheet with all elements of Endgame v3  endgame_cheatsheet31810×1045 301 KB  Clustering diagram  Cluster diagram 21920×1008 66.2 KB
